@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

[quote=“underdrive, post:6, topic:367677”]ok how do i change the login box because it says connecting to evolutoinX please wait…
i want to change it to my server name

and when it is finished loading it says welcome to evolutionX please enter username and password i want to change it to welcome to (my serverr name)[/quote]
You figure out the picture problem?

To change the text; that is in Client.Java.

item.title: Changing client picture background please help
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

underdrive:

So you mean to delete the one that says title and drag my own picture there and name it title?

Don’t delete it, just open it up with paint. Then click open > your wanting picture > save > don’t change name.

Read full topic

item.title: Changing client picture background please help
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

i_hollowfied:

Client folder>Files>spirts - Go down till you see Title then replace Title with your b ground then rename the new b ground to “title” also make sure your background is in Png form

Uhm… To be sure you don’t have errors:

Go to the Picture, open with Paint > Click Open > Find the wanting picture, and open it > Click Save > Don’t rename picture.

Read full topic
